Frequency once per round

Requirements You have at least one telekinetic hand free

Effect Your telekinetic hand lifts an object of up to 8 Bulk as though it were weightless. If the object is locked or otherwise held in place, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Force Open]{Force it Open} using Arcana, Athletics, Occultism, or Physical Science Lore as part of this action. The object still has its full weight and Bulk for all other purposesâ€”you just ignore that weight. This effect lasts until the end of your turn.
